dcterms:creator: A. Aw
M. Rascle
dcterms:description: The Aw-Rascle-Zhang (ARZ) model is a second-order traffic flow model that incorporates nonlinear first-order partial differential equations to describe traffic dynamics, particularly in congested conditions.
dcterms:title: Aw-Rascle-Zhang (ARZ) model

dcterms:creator: M. J. Lighthill
G. B. Whitham
dcterms:description: The Lighthill-Whitham-Richards (LWR) model describes the conservation law of traffic density and the formation and propagation of traffic density waves on long crowded roads.
dcterms:title: Lighthill-Whitham-Richards (LWR) model

dcterms:creator: M. Treiber
A. Kesting
dcterms:description: Traffic flow dynamics data includes various models and simulations that analyze traffic flow behavior and dynamics.
dcterms:title: Traffic flow dynamics data

dcterms:creator: B. Dadashova
X. Li
S. Turner
P. Koeneman
dcterms:description: This dataset involves a multivariate time series analysis of traffic congestion measures in urban areas, relating them to socioeconomic indicators.
dcterms:title: Traffic congestion measures in urban areas

dcterms:creator: S. Fan
B. Seibold
dcterms:description: This dataset includes data-fitted first-order traffic models and their second-order generalizations, comparing performance using trajectory and sensor data.
dcterms:title: Data-fitted first-order traffic models

dcterms:creator: H. Wei
X. Liu
L. Mashayekhy
K. Decker
dcterms:description: This dataset focuses on mixed-autonomy traffic control using proximal policy optimization, analyzing the performance of traffic control strategies.
dcterms:title: Mixed-autonomy traffic control data

dcterms:creator: A. I. Delis
I. K. Nikolos
M. Papageorgiou
dcterms:description: This dataset involves macroscopic traffic flow modeling with adaptive cruise control, focusing on the development and numerical solution of the model.
dcterms:title: Traffic flow modeling with adaptive cruise control
